title: Godrej 255 L Frost Free Double Door 2 Star Refrigerator  (Royal Dremin, RF EON 255B 25 HI RY DR)

product_specification.In The Box:
1 Refrigerator
User Manual and Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: 2.5 L Aqua Space, Dairy Bin, Humidity Controller, Wide Shelves, Large Vegetable Tray
product_specification.Technology Used: Anti B Technology, Cool Shower Technology
product_specification.Other Features: Humidity Controller, Jumbo Vegetable Tray, Sliding Chiller Tray, Transparent, 2.5 L Bottle Shelf, Anti B Technology, Cool Shower Technology
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's. Call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance Or text "Hi" to 9321665511 on WhatsApp
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Godrej
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Refrigerator comes with a 10 yr warranty on compressor and 1 yr warranty on all other parts (except bulb, glass and add on plastic parts) from the date of purchase, against defective material and good workmanship.In the warranty period beyond the first year of purchase , only the compressor will be provided free of cost.However , the appliance will be repaired on payment of necessary charges.
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Incase, the appliance or any part is subjected to neglect, abuse or misuse , tampering, alteration or any other acts of God, or damage by rodents and insects
Warranty automatically expires after the stipulated period of original purchase even if the refrigerator was not in use for anytime for whatsoever reasons
Warranty does not cover/is not applicable
In case of original number (Serial no., sticker) is removed obliterated or altered from the machine or cabinet
The company is not responsible for any damage caused to the appliances and shall not be liable for any consequential loss or compensation nor refund of purchase price or replacement

product_description.Consistent Cooling: The energy-efficient performance of the Godrej 255 L Double-door Refrigerator ensures balanced cooling inside. And, as this fridge features a large storage capacity, it lets you stock ample quantities of fruits, veggies, and other edible items.
product_description.Capacious Vegetable Tray: Equipped with a large vegetable tray, this refrigerator offers ample storage space to keep fruits and veggies fresh for an extended period of time.

review: Very good nice Godrej 255 l frost free Double Door 2 star refrigerator. Colour is very nice, oder is completely 4 to 5 days delivery . Refrigerator is the good condition thanks you Filpkart time up delivery . Service is the good each and every order current time delivery thanks you once again

Ordered it on 15th May and delivered on 21th may. Thanks for the sincier service of flipkart even in pandemic situation .I am very satisfied with the product.what I really like is the sound.(very less noisy as compare to other brand). Electricity consumption is as described. I can feel the difference in my electricity bill. The design look very luxurious . Don't hesitate to buy this great indian product.I m now fan of this Godrej brand.

Excellent purchase.
Does the job.
Only problem is the noise.
It's not that silent.
Rest is awesome.
Power consumption is also pretty low compared to the similar models.
I'd recommend if you are good with a slight buzzing sound.
Mostly audible during extreme silence
Good cooling, easy to use. Intelligent space utility. Happy with the product. Reducing one star as there was a dented product given earlier which I had to follow-up and get a replacement.

It has been an excellent purchase. Although not too many days have passed since purchase, but Refrigerator delivering very well in all aspects, justifying the brand name Godrej. Flipkart also did very well making delivery & installation on time.
Keep it 😉 up !

Product is worth of money v good but its lock is not working ,demo was givn on phone due to covid ,service executive deliverd 2days late,overall product is good i am happy once the lock is adjusted evry thing will b fine

I purchased 2 refrigerators for my relatives.. both have cooling problem. Customer support is horrible. I complained 10 times.
They never came and complaints are closed automatically.
I tried many times finally technician came and resolved the issue.
Product is nice, installation was also nice.

Review after using for 6 months
Initially the refrigerator was throwing water outside and we could not figure out the quality, thought it may be due to some reason. Going forward, the items kept could not be cooled and things like milk, etc got wasted. Called up the customer care of this product and they have visited 3 times, still the problem is not solved.

Flipkart has given us the defective model and after 10 days there is no support from flipkart.
My whole money got wasted.

Good performers I'm happy from flipkart delivery very fast but installation team is very poor every day call i am coming and i am waiting he is no coming SO installation team is very poor and corporateed

We got this fridge on 6th june 2021, and after 14 days, it starting giving some noise and was not cooling at all.
We complained about this to both flipcart and godrej. So a representative from godrej came and inspected the fridge and concluded that it's compressor is damaged,
Like it's only 14 days since we got the fridge and in 14 days only its compressor got damaged? This what a giant company godrej makes?
And above that, it's almost 5-6 days since that representative came, and there's no solution to our problem.
Till now No response from flipcart nor godrej.
Very disappointing.
Never buy electronic appliances from any e-commerce site. They can send you any defective appliance, and later not gonna help you at all. You'll keep Calling from flipcart to manufacturing company all the time and they'll provide no solution at all.
